media.headline: Arrieta's first K of season
media.blurb: CHI@STL: Arrieta picks up first strikeout of 2017
media.bigblurb: Jake Arrieta catches Dexter Fowler looking in the 1st for his first strikeout of the 2017 season

media.headline: Wainwright's first K of season
media.blurb: CHI@STL: Wainwright records first strikeout of 2017
media.bigblurb: Adam Wainwright records his first strikeout of the season after catching Wilson Contreras looking in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Heyward's RBI single
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Heyward opens scoring with RBI single
media.bigblurb: Jason Heyward plates Addison Russell on an RBI single to left in the 4th to open the scoring against the Cardinals

media.headline: Baez's safety squeeze
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Baez plates Heyward on safety squeeze bunt
media.bigblurb: Javier Baez brings home Jayson Heyward on a successful safety squeeze play in the 4th, extending the Cubs' lead to 2-0

media.headline: Baez's sliding stop
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Baez robs Wong with impressive sliding stop
media.bigblurb: Javiez Baez takes away a hit from Kolten Wong in the 3rd inning on a nice sliding stop up the middle

media.headline: Bryant's outstanding diving stab
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Bryant makes diving stop to rob Diaz of hit
media.bigblurb: Kris Bryant makes a spectacular diving stop down the line and fires to first to take away a hit from Aledmys Diaz in the 4th

media.headline: Carpenter's slick sliding stop
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Carpenter makes sliding backhanded stop
media.bigblurb: Matt Carpenter slides to his right to make a slick backhanded stop off the bat of Anthony Rizzo before flipping to first for the out

media.headline: Cards discuss Piscotty deal
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Cards' broadcast on Piscotty's extension
media.bigblurb: The Cardinals' sideline reporter discusses Stephen Piscotty receiving a contract extension with the team

media.headline: Piscotty injured at plate
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Piscotty injured at plate after scoring
media.bigblurb: Stephen Piscotty scores the Cardinals first run of the game, but would exit with a head contusion after he gets hit by the throw home

media.headline: Adams' first time playing left
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Adams makes first MLB appearance in left
media.bigblurb: In his first MLB appearance in left field, Matt Adams records the putout on a fly ball off the bat of Addison Russell in the 6th

media.headline: Piscotty hit three times in 5th
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Piscotty hit three times in the 5th inning
media.bigblurb: Stephen Piscotty is hit by a pitch, gets hit while taking second on a wild pitch and is hit on the head when scoring all in the 5th inning

media.headline: Heyward's jumping catch
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Heyward chases down ball for leaping grab
media.bigblurb: Jason Heyward runs down a ball before making a leaping grab to take away possible extra bases from Matt Carpenter in the 6th inning

media.headline: Almora Jr.'s spectacular catch
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Almora Jr. robs potential game-tying homer
media.bigblurb: Albert Almora Jr. leaps over the wall to take away a potential game-tying home run away from Matt Adams in the 7th inning

media.headline: Statcast: Heyward's running grab
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Statcast measures Heyward's running grab
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures Jason Heyward's route efficieny on his running grab in right field to rob Matt Carpenter of a hit

media.headline: Adams catches Heyward's fly ball
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Bowman gets Heyward to fly out to Adams
media.bigblurb: In his first MLB appearance in left, Matt Adams catches Jason Heyward's fly ball to end a scoreless 6th inning for Matt Bowman

media.headline: Bowman, Adams have clean 6th
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Bowman, Adams combine for clean inning
media.bigblurb: Matt Bowman, making his season debut, and Matt Adams, making his debut in left field, both contribute to a clean inning for the Cardinals

media.headline: Fowler's leaping snag
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Fowler chases, makes jumping catch near wall
media.bigblurb: Dexter Fowler chases a line drive off the bat of Javier Baez and then makes a leaping catch near the wall to retire Javier Baez in the 9th

media.headline: Wong's tumbling catch
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Wong makes magnificent falling catch
media.bigblurb: Kolten Wong makes an impressive tumbling catch in the 8th after making a last-minute adjustment on a foul ball off the bat of Kris Bryant

media.headline: Baez's superb play ends game
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Baez's stop secures win, call confirmed
media.bigblurb: Javier Baez lays out for a stop and then fires to first to end the game, and the call is confirmed in the 9th after the Cardinals challenge

media.headline: Almora Jr. on his amazing catch
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Almora Jr. discusses amazing grab over wall
media.bigblurb: Albert Almora Jr. discusses his magnificent leaping catch at the wall in the 7th that saved a possible game-tying home run for the Cardinals

media.headline: Must C: Almora Jr. robs a homer
media.blurb: Must C Catch: Almora Jr. robs Adams of a home run
media.bigblurb: Albert Almora Jr. robs Matt Adams of a home run with a leaping grab at the center-field wall

media.headline: Wainwright fans Almora Jr.
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Wainwright escapes trouble with strikeout
media.bigblurb: Adam Wainwright fans Albert Almora Jr. with runners on second and third to get out of the 4th inning

media.headline: Arrieta gets out of trouble
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Arrieta escapes bases-loaded jam in 6th
media.bigblurb: Jake Arrieta gets Randal Grichuk to pop out to short to escape a bases-loaded jam in the 6th unharmed

media.headline: Cards on Lynn's extension
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Cards' broadcast discusses Lynn's extension
media.bigblurb: The Cardinals' reporter discusses the possible Lance Lynn extension prior to his start against the Cubs

media.headline: Matheny on Piscotty's injury
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Matheny on Adams' play, Piscotty's injury
media.bigblurb: Cardinals manager Mike Matheny talks about the play of Matt Adams and Stephen Piscotty's injury-plagued 5th inning

media.headline: Statcast: Almora Jr. robs Adams
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Statcast tracks Almora Jr.'s leaping grab
media.bigblurb: Despite an 83% hit probability, Cubs outfielder Albert Almora Jr. robs Matt Adams of the Cardinals of a possible game-tying home run

media.headline: Wainwright strikes out six
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Wainwright fans six over five innings
media.bigblurb: Adam Wainwright strikes out six Cubs and allows two runs on three hits over five innings of work

media.headline: Baez's remarkable stop ends game
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Baez makes diving stop to seal Cubs' win
media.bigblurb: Javier Baez lays out to make a marvelous diving stop before firing to first to get Kolten Wong, securing the Cubs' first win of the season

media.headline: Arrieta fans six in win
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Arrieta tosses six innings of one-run ball
media.bigblurb: Jake Arrieta strikes out six over six innings, allowing just one unearned run on four hits and two walks to lead the Cubs to a win

media.headline: Davis collects his first save
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Davis tosses scoreless 9th to earn save
media.bigblurb: Wade Davis does not allow a hit during a scoreless 9th and picks up his first save of the 2017 season

media.headline: Recap: CHC 2, STL 1
media.blurb: 4/4/17: Arrieta, defense leads Cubs to first win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Jake Arrieta threw six innings of one-run ball and the Cubs' defense made spectacular plays to help the team to their first win

media.headline: 4/4/17 CG: CHC@STL
media.blurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: CHC@STL
media.bigblurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: CHC@STL

media.headline: Wainwright on his wild pitch
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Wainwright discusses his wild pitch in grass
media.bigblurb: Cardinals pitcher Adam Wainwright discusses his crazy wild pitch from Tuesday night that bounced into the grass
